name: Raven Attunement
requirement: Travel to Bjora Marches to unlock.

levels.name: Raven Bond
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven Spirit to open Raven locks.
levels.instruction: You can now unlock Raven locks.

levels.name: Raven's Light
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven to activate Raven barriers and Raven light shrines.
levels.instruction: You can now activate Raven barriers and Raven light shrines.

levels.name: Raven's Flight
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven to pass through Raven gates.
levels.instruction: Use the Raven's Lens to interact with Raven gates.

levels.name: Raven Bright
levels.description: Master your bond with Raven and receive greater bonuses from Raven gates and barrier shrines.
levels.instruction: Barrier duration doubled. Using Raven gates grants a speed boost.
